results.title: Transplacental passage of atenolol in man.
results.text_hl: Maternal and umbilical serum concentrations of @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, a hydrophilic, cardioselective beta-adrenoceptor antagonist, were studied at delivery in seven cases of @<m>DISEASE_Pregnancy_in_Diabetics</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011254 @@@pregnancy@@@ @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@.

citations.NLM: Melander A, Niklasson B, Ingemarsson I, Liedholm H, Scherstén B, Sjöberg NO. Transplacental passage of atenolol in man. Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 1978 Nov 16;14(2):93-4. PMID: 720380
